[00:00.00]Numb Numb Juice (Explicit) - Schoolboy Q
[00:00.22]Lyrics by：Quincy Hanley/Hykeem Carter/Matthew Day/Nesbitt Wesonga/Mario Loving
[00:00.44]Composed by：Quincy Hanley/Hykeem Carter/Matthew Day/Nesbitt Wesonga/Mario Loving
[00:00.67]Two-door coupe hoppin' out like Jack-in-the-Box n***a
[00:03.61]I'm gon' shoot if this 30's all that I got n***a
[00:06.63]Time's up
[00:07.36]Got my coins up my bars up soon we find 'em
[00:10.41]We gon' slide 'em we lined 'em straight reclined 'em
[00:13.56]Pistol grip I got all kinds of I'm not your driver
[00:16.45]Shot gon' hit him he won't answer I'm blowing ganja
[00:19.59]So much work they call me old school I remind you
[00:22.54]That b***h you think you got is not you where you find her
[00:25.69]She a kickstand a big fan I get behind her
[00:28.89]Then I slid it in I win I win ayy
[00:30.57]I mean that's b***h s**t
[00:31.78]Faking like you got it in your pockets yeah that's b***h s**t
[00:34.62]Talking to them hoes you steady gossip yeah that's b***h s**t
[00:37.94]Telling on your mans so you can scram yeah that's b***h s**t
[00:40.92]Pull it out and acting like it jam yeah that's b***h s**t
[00:44.16]Hating on another n***a come-up yeah that's b***h s**t
[00:47.26]Staying in because you know it's summer yeah that's b***h s**t
[00:50.28]You a b***h boy on my mama uh
[00:54.97]Okay let's get it b***h let's get it woo
[00:58.74]Got a plan we gon' kill his man
[01:00.50]The gun won't jam it's on on sight
[01:02.04]I might get life that's on my life
[01:03.67]The 44 fire the goal green light
[01:05.16]To build that price it filled up nice
[01:06.72]The god won't die
[01:07.50]Okay let's get it b***h let's get it woo
[01:10.88]Seen 'em floss in my purest form b***h I'm greedy uh
[01:13.94]Goyard tags filled with hella cash this my gimme bag
[01:16.95]Singles add we don't do no class n***a nine subtract ayy
[01:20.40]Two-door coupe hoppin' out like Jack-in-the-Box n***a
[01:23.19]I'm gon' shoot if this 30's all that I got n***a
[01:26.16]Y'all on mute ain't no back-talk on my block n***a
[01:29.11]Numb numb juice to the head f**k up the opps n***a
[01:32.26]Two-door coupe hoppin' out like Jack-in-the-Box n***a
[01:35.31]I'm gon' shoot if this 30's all that I got n***a
[01:38.38]Y'all on mute ain't no back-talk on my block n***a
[01:41.35]Numb numb juice to the head f**k up the opps n***a
data.trans:
[ti:Numb Numb Juice (Explicit)]
[ar:Schoolboy Q]
[al:Numb Numb Juice (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:00.22]//
[00:00.44]//
[00:00.67]双开门跑车突然发动 就像玩偶盒里蹦出的小人
[00:03.61]要是我只剩30块钱了 我就拿着家伙去抢
[00:06.63]是时候了
[00:07.36]把钱凑在一起 把东西准备好 我们很快就找到目标
[00:10.41]把他们痛扁一顿 一个个排好 全部射倒
[00:13.56]拿着手枪 我就什么都有了 我不是你的司机
[00:16.45]一枪毙了他 他也不会吱声 我抽着**
[00:19.59]诸事缠身 他们叫我老派说唱 我提醒你
[00:22.54]你以为那个女人是你的 其实不是 你从哪找来的
[00:25.69]她是个骗子 虚伪得很 我站在她后面
[00:28.89]把她弄到手 我赢了
[00:30.57]我是说 那个女人很差劲
[00:31.78]就像你口袋里的钱一样假 那个人很差劲
[00:34.62]跟她们聊天 就喜欢聊些小道消息 那个人很差劲
[00:37.94]出卖你的男人 只想明哲保身 那个人很差劲
[00:40.92]果断抽身离开 毫无感情可言 那个人很差劲
[00:44.16]讨厌那些有所作为的人 那个人很差劲
[00:47.26]一到夏天就呆在家里 那个人很差劲
[00:50.28]用我妹子的话来说 你就是坏小子
[00:54.97]好 开始吧 开始吧
[00:58.74]想了一个计划 我们要杀了他的兄弟
[01:00.50]手枪不会掉链子 瞬间就完事
[01:02.04]我可能会被判无期徒刑 这是我的命
[01:03.67].44手枪开火 目标人物中弹
[01:05.16]为了卖个好价钱 我们都是上等货
[01:06.72]上帝才不会死呢
[01:07.50]好 开始吧 开始吧
[01:10.88]看到他们都在炫耀 我的本性是贪婪的
[01:13.94]Goyard的钱包 里面装满了现金 这是我的钱包
[01:16.95]加一场单人赛 我们从不上学 哥们 九减一等于多少
[01:20.40]双开门跑车突然发动 就像玩偶盒里蹦出的小人
[01:23.19]要是我只剩30块钱了 我就拿着家伙去抢
[01:26.16]一到我的地盘 你们都成了哑巴 没人敢顶嘴
[01:29.11]脑子里一片混乱 干掉所有敌手
[01:32.26]双开门跑车突然发动 就像玩偶盒里蹦出的小人
[01:35.31]要是我只剩30块钱了 我就拿着家伙去抢
[01:38.38]一到我的地盘 你们都成了哑巴 没人敢顶嘴
[01:41.35]脑子里一片混乱 干掉所有敌手
